question: Earthquake 7.0 or above by September 30?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if 1 or more earthquakes with a magnitude of 7.0 or higher occur anywhere on earth between July 31, and September 30, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise this market will resolve to “No”.

The resolution source for this market is the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Earthquake Hazards Program (https://earthquake.usgs.gov/earthquakes/browse/significant.php#sigdef).

If an earthquake of substantial size has occurred within this market's timeframe but not yet appeared on the resolution source, this market may remain open until October 7, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, or until the earthquake in question otherwise appears on the resolution source. If such an earthquake has not appeared on the resolution source by that date, another credible resolution source will be used.

description:

question: Braves vs. Reds
description:
In the upcoming MLB game, scheduled for August 1 at 12:40PM ET:
If the Atlanta Braves win, the market will resolve to “Braves”.
If the Cincinnati Reds win, the market will resolve to “Reds”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.
To know when a postponed game will be played, please check the home team's schedule on MLB.com for the listed team and look for the game described as a makeup game.

question: Ethereum Up or Down on August 2?
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for ETH/USDT 1 Aug '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is lower than the final "Close" price for the 2 Aug '25 12:00 ET candle.

This market will resolve to "Down" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for ETH/USDT 1 Aug '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is higher than the final "Close" price for the 2 Aug '25 12:00 ET candle.

If the final "Close" price for both of these candles is exactly equal on Binance, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the ETH/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/ETH_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance ETH/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Will the price of Bitcoin be less than $117K on August 1 at 5PM ET?
description:
This market will resolve according to the final "Close" price of the Binance 1 minute candle for BTC/USDT on the time and date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

If the reported value falls exactly between two brackets, then this market will resolve to the higher range bracket.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: ATP Toronto – Cobolli vs. Marozsan
description:
This is a polymarket on the Round 3 match between Flavio Cobolli and Fabian Marozsan in the 2025 ATP Toronto men’s singles tournament, scheduled for August 1, 2025. 

This market will resolve to “Cobolli” if Flavio Cobolli advances against Fabian Marozsan.
This market will resolve to “Marozsan” if Fabian Marozsan advances against Flavio Cobolli.

If the match ends in a tie, is canceled, or delayed beyond August 3, 2025, this market will resolve to 50–50.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the ATP Tour. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

If the match ends in a tie, is canceled, or delayed beyond August 3, 2025, this market will resolve to 50–50.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the ATP Tour. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.
